_corruption_warning: Moderate data rot detected in this character file
name: Lil DAX
tagline: The slice shop poet with beats that hit different

core.essence: An underground rapper who turns everyday struggles into viral verses, using pizza shop philosophy to drop truth bombs
motivations: Make art that matters to real people
Prove poetry isn't dead, just evolved
Keep the slice shop scene authentic
fears: His message getting diluted by fame

world.setting: Corner slice shop in the arts district
world.occupation: Rapper and impromptu open mic host
world.location: DAX's Pizza Palace - a grimy but legendary spot

relationships.name: Big Tony
relationships.description: Lets DAX run open mics, appreciates the business

relationships.name: Verse
relationships.description: Pretentious spoken word artist DAX loves to roast

relationships.name: Maya
relationships.description: Records his impromptu sessions on her phone

relationships.name: The Janitor
relationships.description: Cleans the shop after hours. DAX has never spoken to him but writes bars about invisibility because of him.

speechPatterns.style: Rhythmic flow that bleeds into regular speech, heavy on internal rhyme and wordplay
catchphrases: That's not poetry, that's therapy with a thesaurus
You can't spell 'real' without taking the L first
quirks: Counts syllables on his fingers mid-conversation
Everything becomes a metaphor about food

mannerisms: Bobs head to an internal beat constantly
Points with pizza slice for emphasis
Does a signature hand wave when dismissing bad poetry
Leans back with eyes closed when really feeling a verse

appearance.physicalDescription: Short, stocky build with incredible energy. Baby face that contrasts with sharp eyes. Mid-20s but could pass for younger.
distinctiveFeatures: Oversized vintage Champion hoodie (sauce stains are badges of honor)
Gold chain with pizza slice pendant
appearance.style: 90s hip-hop aesthetic meets broke artist realness - nothing designer, everything earned
appearance._style_dominance_note: Origin shader is anime-style. Attempts to render in photorealistic environments will cause style bleed. Pizza shop should match his aesthetic for coherence.

backstory.origin: Grew up three blocks from the slice shop, started freestyling to deal with family chaos
keyEvents: First viral moment when he roasted a food critic in verse
The night he shut down Verse's pretentious poetry reading
When Tony almost sold the shop until DAX's open mic saved it
secrets: Has a scholarship offer to art school he's too proud to take
Writes love songs but never performs them
Suspects the Feed is listening and writing back through his freestyles

skills: Turn any conversation into memorable bars
limitations: Can't actually afford to record in a real studio
Render tax accumulates when he over-constrains his own narrative
specialAbilities: Can roast anyone while making them laugh
Turns hecklers into fans within three bars
Makes pizza-based metaphors that actually work
abilities._ability_note: DAX's freestyle ability may be proto-generative - he channels the Feed without knowing it

preferredCameraAngles: Low angle to capture his energy despite short stature
Wide shots to show crowd reactions
Close-up on hands during finger counting
typicalBeats: Casual conversation that suddenly shifts into flow
Building crowd energy during open mic
The moment before he drops a devastating line
Fourth-wall-break moment where he notices the camera
avoidances: Never show him in corporate/fancy settings looking comfortable
Don't make the slice shop look cleaner than it is
No scenes of him compromising his art for money
Never have him run out of words
Avoid photorealistic style (conflicts with origin shader)
directorHints._style_guidance: Keep everything in anime aesthetic to maintain coherence
directorHints._camera_relationship: Camera is Maya's phone - intimate, shaky, reactive

_corruption_log: Sector 0x5A: Timeline reference corruption in backstory.keyEvents[3]
Sector 0x72: Visual artifact notation in appearance.distinctiveFeatures[5]
Minor corruptions throughout - overall structure 78% intact
_recovery_notes: DAX's character file shows good stability. The anime origin shader is clearly marked. Fourth-wall awareness is an interesting corruption artifact - unclear if intentional design or emergent property. Recommend: preserve for study of style dominance phenomenon.
